abstract: While other technology giants send teams of executives and host lavish parties, Apple is not even an official participant – and yet its gadgets are everywhere.
snippet: While other technology giants send teams of executives and host lavish parties, Apple is not even an official participant – and yet its gadgets are everywhere.
lead_paragraph: RIA Novosti/ReutersRussia’s President Dmitri Medvedev using an iPad at Davos.

headline.main: Is Apple the Smartest Company at Davos?

abstract: One year to the day after Steve Jobs unveiled the iPad, the News Corporation says it is ready to unveil its iPad newspaper, The Daily.
snippet: One year to the day after Steve Jobs unveiled the iPad, the News Corporation says it is ready to unveil its iPad newspaper, The Daily.
lead_paragraph: One year to the day after Steve Jobs unveiled the iPad, the News Corporation said it was ready to unveil its iPad newspaper, The Daily.

headline.main: News Corporation to Release The Daily Next Week
